original_title: Alligator Alcatraz: Who’s in charge of the Florida facility? Here’s why that question is important | CNN
article_summary: "The question of who is in charge of the controversial Alligator Alcatraz immigrant detention facility in Florida is central to ongoing legal battles. While state and federal authorities claim it's a state-run facility, critics argue this raises concerns about accountability and oversight. The answer could determine whether the facility must comply with federal environmental laws and whether it can continue operations."</s>
